HomePage.heroSubtitle: Visual Artist, Surgeon & Cultural Manager · Cuenca, Ecuador
HomePage.processDescription: A life between the operating room and the canvas. Since the age of four, art and medicine have been the two pillars of my life — paths that converge in every work.
HomePage.ctaDescription: Original oil paintings exploring the human condition through the eyes of a surgeon and self-taught artist. Inquire about availability or commission a custom piece.

Artwork.shippingAnswer: Each artwork is professionally packed with archival materials. Domestic shipping available from Cuenca. International shipping upon request. Includes insurance and tracking.
Artwork.framingAnswer: Artworks are delivered unframed to allow for customization. I can recommend professional framers in Cuenca and other cities.
Artwork.commissionAnswer: Yes, I accept commissions for portraits, figurative works, and murals. Contact me via WhatsApp to discuss your project.
Artwork.returnsAnswer: Your satisfaction is my priority. If the artwork doesn't meet your expectations upon delivery, contact me within 14 days to arrange a return.
